text:
So, on the one side it was 2 months for the “Russian” “password spray attack”
that somehow got in past what should be MFA secured CorpNet properties and now
this? 
“…Immediately…”? 
Maybe my lenses need to be cleaned but colour them rose there’s something not
lining up here. 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:  
Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 
Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 
Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 
Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 
Skype: MPECSInc. 
Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls
instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday.

metadata.topic: RE: More on the Midnight blizzard
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] RE: More on the Midnight blizzard
